com.qualcomm.robotcore.robocol

Class PeerDiscoveryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.robocol.PeerDiscoveryManager

  • public class PeerDiscoveryManager
extends java.lang.Object
    PeerDiscoveryManager is responsible for periodic transmission of PeerDiscovery packets. This isn't used, though, from the 'group owner' (ie: robot controller)
